guild.description:
Here we go again...

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/post/66iv/ee_ubwXLfNg)

*Cabal*: n. the contrived schemes of a group of persons secretly united in a plot - also: a group engaged in such schemes.

*Powermod*: n. [short for power moderator] a person of power, usually a moderator on a structured website, that takes too many unpopulist stances

This guild is dedicated to whistleblowing and preventing powermods and the forming of a powermod oligarchy which would censor opinions and lead Ruqqus into the same corruption that is killing Reddit.
guild.description_html:
Here we go again...

Powermod: n. [short for power moderator] a person of power, usually a moderator on a structured website, that takes too many unpopulist stances

This guild is dedicated to whistleblowing and preventing powermods and the forming of a powermod oligarchy which would censor opinions and lead Ruqqus into the same corruption that is killing Reddit.
guild.name: The_Cabal

body:
[I hereby demand to be made a powermod on grounds that Ruqqus has already declared me to be an admin](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/bd5v/wait-what-how-did-i-become).

It is obviously a sign from Ruqqus itself that you should grant me as much power over this site as possible. I'm clearly more deserving of it than random dudes who happened to be in the right place at the right time.
body_html:
I hereby demand to be made a powermod on grounds that Ruqqus has already declared me to be an admin.

It is obviously a sign from Ruqqus itself that you should grant me as much power over this site as possible. I'm clearly more deserving of it than random dudes who happened to be in the right place at the right time.

*Cabal*: n. the contrived schemes of a group of persons secretly united in a plot - also: a group engaged in such schemes.

This guild is dedicated to whistleblowing and preventing powermods and the forming of a powermod oligarchy which would censor opinions and lead Ruqqus into the same corruption that is killing Reddit.
